import { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Productt from "../../until/layoutauto"; import useProductFilter from "../../until/fillter"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import AddProduct from "../../until/cart"; import axios from 'axios'; export default function Product() { Productt(); useProductFilter(); AddProduct(); const [data, setData] = useState([]); const loadData = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/getallsp"); setData(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching data", error); } }; useEffect(() => { loadData(); }, []); // Chạy useEffect này mỗi khi data thay đổi const formatCurrency = (number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' }).format(number); }; return (
